TextLibrary.Text: I learnt nothing on Acheron, but we should return later. The creature I met there may still help us.
I learnt nothing on Acheron, but we should return later. The creature I met there may still help us.
Then we must search all 4 Systems beyond here: Gorgon, Hades, Gehenna, Typhon.
Then we must search all 4 Systems beyond here: Gorgon, Hades, Gehenna, Typhon.
We probably only need to scan the planets. If something big is going down, we'll try to find it and then get out as quickly as possible. Set course for Gorgon III.
We probably only need to scan the planets. If something big is going down, we'll try to find it and then get out as quickly as possible. Set course for Gorgon III.
